entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 5:18 PM PST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning and 40 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 600 metres in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:18 PM PST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:18 PM PST Friday 10 March 2023
